sqlMap.select:
SELECT 1 FROM t_attemp_PTP WHERE RELATED_NE_CUID IN
#ptpsList[]#
SELECT '0' cuid FROM AN_ONU WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# union all SELECT cuid FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
sqlMap.update: update ptp p set p.port_state = '1' where p.cuid = (select ao.related_pos_port_cuid from t_attemp_an_onu ao where ao.cuid = #cuid#)
update t_attemp_ptp p set p.port_state = '1' where p.cuid = (select ao.related_pos_port_cuid from t_attemp_an_onu ao where ao.cuid = #cuid#)
update ptp p set p.port_state = #portState# where p.cuid = #cuid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR WHERE CUID=(SELECT VENDOR_NAME FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE WHERE CUID=#CUID#)

SELECT A.CUID, A.LABEL_CN, A.DEV_IP, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_POS_CUID union all SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_AN_POS T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_POS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_POS_CUID, A.RELATED_POS_CUID, (SELECT P.LABEL_CN FROM PTP P WHERE P.CUID = A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID union all SELECT P.LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.CUID = A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID, A.RELATED_POS_PORT_CUID, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID WHEN A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT END RELATED_SPACE_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN (SELECT R.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM ROOM R WHERE R.CUID = A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID) WHEN A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT != ' ' THEN (SELECT AP.LABEL_CN FROM ACCESSPOINT AP WHERE AP.CUID = A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT) END N_RELATED_SPACE_CUID, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM NMS_SYSTEM T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_EMS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_EMS_CUID, A.RELATED_EMS_CUID, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID) AS N_RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, (SELECT F.PRODUCT_MODEL FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE F WHERE F.SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND F.CUID = A.MODEL) AS N_MODEL, A.MODEL, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_OLT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_OLT_CUID, A.RELATED_OLT_CUID, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM PTP T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_OLT_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_OLT_PORT_CUID, A.RELATED_OLT_PORT_CUID, A.NATIVE_EMS_NAME, A.SEQNO, A.HARD_VERSION, A.SOFT_VERSION, A.SETUP_TIME, A.REAL_LONGITUDE, A.OWNERSHIP_MAN, A.LATITUDE, A.REAL_LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.REMARK, A.AUTH_TYPE, A.MAC_ADDR, A.PASSWORD, A.LOGICID, A.ONU_ID, A.FTTX, A.ONU_TYPE, A.RELATED_TEMPLATE_NAME, A.RELATED_PROJECT_CUID, A.LAST_MODIFY_USER, A.CREATOR_NAME, A.OWNERSHIP, A.PORT_NUMBER, A.MAINT_PERSON, A.DATA_QUALITY_PERSON, A.MAINT_MODE, A.ACCESS_TYPE, A.LOCATION, A.STANDARD_NAME, A.RELATED_ACCESS_POINT, A.PRESERVER, A.CREATE_TIME, A.LIVE_CYCLE FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU A WHERE CUID = #CUID#

SELECT SUBSTR(RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, 0, 26) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM FIBER_CAB_GX WHERE CUID = #CUID# UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, 0, 26) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID FROM FIBER_DP_GX WHERE CUID = #CUID#
sqlMap.update: update t_attemp_card c set c.label_cn = ((select ap.labeL_cn|| '-' || substr(c.fdn, instr(c.fdn, 'slot=') + 5, instr(c.fdn, ':Equipment=1') - instr(c.fdn, 'slot=') - 5) || '-' || nvl(trim(c.component_name), 'VBoard') from t_attemp_an_onu ap where ap.cuid = c.related_device_cuid) ) where c.related_device_cuid = #CUID#
update t_attemp_ptp p set p.label_cn = ((select c.labeL_cn|| '-' || lpad(p.port_no, 2, 0) from t_attemp_card c where c.cuid = p.related_card_cuid) ) where p.related_ne_cuid = #CUID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT 1 FROM t_sf_rofh_product WHERE access_port = #CUID#
select ao.label_cn from t_attemp_an_onu ao where ao.related_pos_port_cuid = #CUID# union all select ap.label_cn from t_attemp_an_pos ap where ap.related_upne_port_cuid = #CUID#

SELECT 'PTP' AS BM_CLASS_ID, CASE WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 1 THEN ( SELECT LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID ) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 2 THEN ( SELECT LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID ) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 3 THEN ( SELECT LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_AN_POS WHERE CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID ) END N_RELATED_NE_CUID, P.RELATED_NE_CUID, CASE WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 1 THEN (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = TE.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM TRANS_ELEMENT TE WHERE TE.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 2 THEN (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = AO.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU AO WHERE AO.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) WHEN P.DEV_TYPE = 3 THEN (SELECT (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = AP.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) FROM t_attemp_AN_POS AP WHERE AP.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) END N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, P.CUID,P.LABEL_CN,P.PORT_TYPE,P.PORT_SUB_TYPE,P.PORT_NO,P.PORT_STATE,P.VLAN,P.PORT_RATE,P.REMARK, (SELECT C.LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CARD_CUID,P.RELATED_CARD_CUID, (SELECT C.FDN FROM t_attemp_CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_FDN, (select C.CARDTYPE_NAME FROM CARD_KIND C, t_attemp_CARD D WHERE D.MODEL=C.CUID AND D.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_CARD_KIND_CUID FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.CUID = #CUID#

SELECT P.CUID,P.LABEL_CN,P.PORT_TYPE,P.PORT_NO,P.PORT_SUB_TYPE,P.OPERATING_STATE,P.REMARK, (SELECT C.LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_CARD C WHERE C.CUID = P.RELATED_CARD_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CARD_CUID,P.RELATED_CARD_CUID, (SELECT N.LABEL_CN FROM NMS_SYSTEM N WHERE N.CUID = P.RELATED_EMS_CUID) AS N_RELATED_EMS_CUID,P.RELATED_EMS_CUID, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID UNION SELECT O.LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU O WHERE O.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID UNION SELECT A.LABEL_CN FROM t_attemp_AN_POS A WHERE A.CUID = P.RELATED_NE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_NE_CUID,P.RELATED_NE_CUID,PORT_RATE,VLAN,PORT_STATE FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.CUID = #CUID#
SELECT ap.*,'0' type FROM AN_POS ap WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# union all SELECT tp.*,'1' type FROM t_attemp_AN_pos tp WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT * FROM PTP WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# AND RELATED_NE_CUID=#RELATED_NE_CUID# union all SELECT * FROM T_ATTEMP_PTP WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# AND RELATED_NE_CUID=#RELATED_NE_CUID#
sqlMap.update:
update ptp set port_state = 1 where cuid in
#ports[]#

update ptp set port_state = 2 where cuid in
#ports[]#

update t_attemp_ptp set port_state = 1 where cuid in
#ports[]#

update t_attemp_ptp set port_state = 2 where cuid in
#ports[]#

UPDATE T_ATTEMP_AN_POS SET LAST_MODIFY_TIME=#LAST_MODIFY_TIME#,LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#,RELATED_VENDOR_CUID=#RELATED_VENDOR_CUID#,SETUP_TIME=#SETUP_TIME#,SEQNO=#SEQNO#,RATION=#RATION#, RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID=#RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID#,RELATED_SITE_CUID=#RELATED_SITE_CUID#,RELATED_ROOM_CUID=#RELATED_ROOM_CUID#,REMARK=#REMARK#,LIVE_CYCLE=#LIVE_CYCLE#, MODEL=#MODEL#,HARD_VERSION=#HARD_VERSION#,SOFT_VERSION=#SOFT_VERSION#,REAL_LONGITUDE=#REAL_LONGITUDE#, REAL_LATITUDE=#REAL_LATITUDE#,NATIVE_EMS_NAME=#NATIVE_EMS_NAME#,RELATED_OLT_CUID=#RELATED_OLT_CUID#,RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#, FDN=#FDN#,RELATED_TEMPLATE_NAME=#RELATED_TEMPLATE_NAME#,related_cab_cuid=#RELATED_CAB_CUID#,RELATED_PROJECT_CUID=#RELATED_PROJECT_CUID#, MAINT_MODE=#MAINT_MODE#,LAST_MODIFY_USER=#LAST_MODIFY_USER#,CREATOR_NAME=#CREATOR_NAME#,OWNERSHIP=#OWNERSHIP#,OWNERSHIP_MAN=#OWNERSHIP_MAN#, PRESERVER=#PRESERVER#,STANDARD_NAME=#STANDARD_NAME# ,BACK_NETWORK_TIME=#BACK_NETWORK_TIME#,RELATED_PORT_CUID =#RELATED_PORT_CUID#,RELATED_PORT2_CUID =#RELATED_PORT2_CUID#, LOCATION=#LOCATION#,ACCESS_TYPE=#ACCESS_TYPE#,CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER=#CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER#,CREATE_TIME=#CREATE_TIME#, MAINT_PERSON = #MAINT_PERSON#,DATA_QUALITY_PERSON=#DATA_QUALITY_PERSON#,REPAIR_TIME=#REPAIR_TIME#,RELATED_UPNE_CUID=#RELATED_UPNE_CUID#,RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID=#RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID#, RELATED_ACCESS_POINT = #RELATED_ACCESS_POINT# WHERE CUID = #CUID#
UPDATE t_attemp_CARD SET FDN = #FDN#, RELATED_UPPER_COMPONENT_CUID = #RELATED_UPPER_COMPONENT_CUID# WHERE CUID = #CUID#

update t_attemp_ptp p set fdn = (select ap.fdn || substr(p.fdn, instr(p.fdn, ':PTP=')) from (select fdn,cuid from t_attemp_an_pos union all select fdn,cuid from t_attemp_an_onu) ap where ap.cuid = p.related_ne_cuid) where p.related_ne_cuid = #cuid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CUID FROM FIBER_CAB_GX WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# UNION ALL SELECT CUID FROM FIBER_DP_GX WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT CUID FROM NMS_SYSTEM WHERE LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#
SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN,FDN FROM AN_POS T WHERE CUID = #nameValue# UNION ALL SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN,FDN FROM T_ATTEMP_AN_POS WHERE CUID = #nameValue#

SELECT CUID, UP_DEV_TYPE,LABEL_CN,RELATED_OLT_CUID,RELATED_PORT_CUID FROM (SELECT AP.CUID, 'POS' AS UP_DEV_TYPE ,LABEL_CN,RELATED_OLT_CUID,RELATED_PORT_CUID FROM AN_POS AP WHERE AP.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# UNION ALL SELECT TP.CUID, 'POS' AS UP_DEV_TYPE ,LABEL_CN,RELATED_OLT_CUID,RELATED_PORT_CUID FROM T_ATTEMP_AN_POS TP WHERE TP.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# UNION ALL SELECT TE.CUID, 'OLT' AS UP_DEV_TYPE,LABEL_CN,'' AS RELATED_OLT_CUID,'' AS RELATED_PORT_CUID FROM TRANS_ELEMENT TE WHERE TE.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN#)
SELECT related_port_cuid FROM an_pos WHERE cuid = #CUID#

SELECT AO.CUID AS RELATED_NE_CUID, AO.LABEL_CN, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.RELATED_NE_CUID = AO.CUID) AS PTPNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.PORT_SUB_TYPE = 14 AND P.RELATED_NE_CUID = AO.CUID) AS UPPTPNUM FROM t_attemp_AN_ONU AO WHERE AO.CUID IN ($neCuidStr$)

SELECT AP.CUID AS RELATED_NE_CUID, AP.LABEL_CN, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.RELATED_NE_CUID = AP.CUID) AS PTPNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_attemp_PTP P WHERE P.PORT_SUB_TYPE = 12 AND P.RELATED_NE_CUID = AP.CUID) AS UPPTPNUM, AP.RATION FROM t_attemp_AN_POS AP WHERE AP.CUID IN ($neCuidStr$)
SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN,FDN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE CUID = #nameValue#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_attemp_PTP SET LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN#,PORT_TYPE=#PORT_TYPE#,PORT_NO=#PORT_NO#,RELATED_EMS_CUID=#RELATED_EMS_CUID#,SYS_NO=#SYS_NO#, RELATED_CARD_CUID=#RELATED_CARD_CUID#,FDN=#FDN#,LAST_MODIFY_TIME=#LAST_MODIFY_TIME#,RELATED_NE_CUID=#RELATED_NE_CUID#, DEV_TYPE = #DEV_TYPE#,PORT_SUB_TYPE=#PORT_SUB_TYPE#,PORT_RATE=#PORT_RATE#,VLAN=#VLAN#,PORT_STATE=#PORT_STATE#,REMARK=#REMARK# WHERE CUID = #CUID#
update ptp p set p.port_state = '1' where p.cuid = (select ap.related_upne_port_cuid from an_pos ap where ap.cuid = #cuid#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.OBJECTID, A.GT_VERSION, A.IS_PERMIT_SYS_DEL, A.FDN, A.RELATED_TEMPLATE_NAME, A.ABBREVIATION, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM PTP WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID, A.RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM PTP WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_PORT2_CUID) AS N_RELATED_PORT2_CUID, A.RELATED_PORT2_CUID, A.NATIVE_EMS_NAME, A.LIVE_CYCLE, A.USE_STATE, (SELECT F.PRODUCT_MODEL FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE F WHERE F.SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND F.CUID = A.MODEL) AS N_MODEL, A.MODEL, A.HARD_VERSION, A.SOFT_VERSION, A.LOCATION, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID WHEN A.RELATED_CAB_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_CAB_CUID != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_CAB_CUID END RELATED_SPACE_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN (SELECT R.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM ROOM R WHERE R.CUID = A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID) WHEN A.RELATED_CAB_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_CAB_CUID != ' ' THEN (SELECT AP.LABEL_CN FROM ACCESSPOINT AP WHERE AP.CUID = A.RELATED_CAB_CUID) END N_RELATED_SPACE_CUID, A.SETUP_TIME, A.SEQNO, A.LABEL_CN, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID) AS N_RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, A.RELATED_CAB_CUID, A.REAL_LONGITUDE, A.REAL_LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.LATITUDE, A.RATION, A.CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER, A.OWNERSHIP_MAN, (SELECT T.LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT T WHERE T.CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID UNION ALL SELECT P.LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS P WHERE P.CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_UPNE_CUID, A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID, A.REMARK, A.CUID, A.ISDELETE, A.CREATE_TIME, A.LAST_MODIFY_TIME, /*A.related_cab_cuid as RELATED_CAB_CUID,*/ (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM FIBER_CAB_GX WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_CAB_CUID UNION ALL SELECT LABEL_CN FROM FIBER_DP_GX WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_CAB_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CAB_CUID, A.RELATED_CAB_CUID, A.RELATED_PROJECT_CUID, A.MAINT_MODE, A.LAST_MODIFY_USER, A.CREATOR_NAME, A.OWNERSHIP, A.MAINT_PERSON, A.DATA_QUALITY_PERSON, A.REPAIR_TIME, A.PRESERVER, A.STANDARD_NAME, A.ACCESS_TYPE, A.LABEL_DEV FROM AN_POS A WHERE CUID = #CUID#

SELECT '一级' AS POS_TYPE,CUID, 'OLT' AS UP_DEV_TYPE,LABEL_CN,'' AS RELATED_OLT_CUID,'' AS RELATED_PORT_CUID FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE SIGNAL_TYPE=9 AND CONFIG_TYPE=1 AND CUID= #upNeCuid# UNION ALL SELECT '二级' AS POS_TYPE,CUID ,'POS' AS UP_DEV_TYPE ,LABEL_CN,RELATED_OLT_CUID,RELATED_PORT_CUID FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = #upNeCuid#
SELECT FDN FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = #CUID#

SELECT A.CUID, 'AN_POS' AS BM_CLASS_ID, A.LABEL_CN, A.STANDARD_NAME, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID WHEN A.RELATED_CAB_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_CAB_CUID != ' ' THEN A.RELATED_CAB_CUID END RELATED_SPACE_CUID, CASE WHEN A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID != ' ' THEN (SELECT R.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM ROOM R WHERE R.CUID = A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID) WHEN A.RELATED_CAB_CUID IS NOT NULL AND A.RELATED_CAB_CUID != ' ' THEN (SELECT AP.LABEL_CN FROM ACCESSPOINT AP WHERE AP.CUID = A.RELATED_CAB_CUID) END N_RELATED_SPACE_CUID, A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN AS NAME FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, A.RELATED_ROOM_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM T_ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS WHERE CUID = A.LOCATION) AS N_LOCATION, A.LOCATION, A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID AND SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND CONFIG_TYPE = 1 UNION ALL SELECT LABEL_CN FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID) AS N_RELATED_UPNE_CUID, (SELECT '一级' FROM TRANS_ELEMENT WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID AND SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND CONFIG_TYPE = 1 UNION ALL SELECT '二级' FROM AN_POS WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_CUID) AS POS_TYPE, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM PTP WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID) AS N_RELATED_UPNE_PORT_CUID, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM PTP WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_PORT2_CUID) AS N_RELATED_PORT2_CUID,
(SELECT F.PRODUCT_MODEL FROM NE_MODEL_CFG_TYPE F WHERE F.SIGNAL_TYPE = 9 AND F.CUID = A.MODEL) AS N_MODEL, A.MODEL, (SELECT D.LABEL_CN FROM DEVICE_VENDOR D WHERE D.CUID = A.RELATED_VENDOR_CUID) AS N_RELATED_VENDOR_CUID, RELATED_VENDOR_CUID,
A.OWNERSHIP, A.OWNERSHIP_MAN, A.SEQNO, A.REAL_LONGITUDE, A.REAL_LATITUDE, A.RELATED_PROJECT_CUID, A.LIVE_CYCLE, TO_CHAR(A.SETUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SETUP_TIME , TO_CHAR(A.BACK_NETWORK_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BACK_NETWORK_TIME , A.RATION, A.ACCESS_TYPE, A.PRESERVER, A.MAINT_MODE, A.CAN_ALLOCATE_TO_USER, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM FIBER_CAB_GX WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_CAB_CUID UNION ALL SELECT LABEL_CN FROM FIBER_DP_GX WHERE CUID = A.RELATED_CAB_CUID) AS N_RELATED_CAB_CUID, A.RELATED_CAB_CUID, TO_CHAR(A.CREATTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATTIME , A.RELATED_CAB_CUID, TO_CHAR(A.REPAIR_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REPAIR_TIME , 'GPON_COVER.RELATED_NE_CUID=' || A.CUID || '[' || (SELECT COUNT(R.CUID) FROM GPON_COVER R, AN_ONU O WHERE O.RELATED_POS_CUID = A.CUID AND R.RELATED_NE_CUID = O.CUID) || ']' AS CONVER_COUNT, 'T_ROFH_CUSTOMER.RELATED_NE_CUID=' || A.CUID || '[' || (SELECT COUNT(ACCOUNT_NAME) FROM PON_WAY_ANMS WHERE RELATED_LIGHT_CUID = A.CUID) || ']' AS USER_COUNT FROM AN_POS A WHERE CUID=#CUID#
SELECT T.CUID, T.LABEL_CN, T.RELATED_NE_CUID FROM PTP T WHERE T.PORT_SUB_TYPE NOT IN (11,12) and T.PORT_STATE =1 and T.RELATED_NE_CUID = #cuid#

SELECT 'ROOM' AS SPACE_TYPE, (SELECT S.RELATED_SPACE_CUID FROM SITE S WHERE S.CUID = R.RELATED_SITE_CUID) AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, R.RELATED_SITE_CUID, R.CUID AS RELATED_ROOM_CUID, '' AS RELATED_ACCESS_POINT FROM ROOM R WHERE R.CUID = #cuid# UNION ALL SELECT 'ACCESSPOINT' AS SPACE_TYPE, A.DISTRICT_CUID AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, A.SITE_CUID AS RELATED_SITE_CUID, A.ROOM_CUID AS RELATED_ROOM_CUID, A.CUID AS RELATED_ACCESS_POINT FROM ACCESSPOINT A WHERE A.CUID = #cuid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS (CUID, OBJECT_ID, LABEL_CN, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, TOWN, VILLAGES, BUILDING, UNIT_NO, FLOOR_NO, RELATED_BMCLASSTYPE_CUID, RELATED_COMMUNITY_CUID) VALUES (#CUID#, get_object_id('T_ROFH_FULL_ADDRESS'), #LABEL_CN#, (SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE ALIAS = #PROVINCE#), (SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE ALIAS = #CITY#), (SELECT CUID FROM DISTRICT WHERE ALIAS = #COUNTY#), #TOWN#, #VILLAGES#, #BUILDING#, #UNIT_NO#, #FLOOR_NO#, #RELATED_BMCLASSTYPE_CUID#, #RELATED_COMMUNITY_CUID#)
INSERT INTO BUSINESS_COMMUNITY (CUID, LABEL_CN, CITY, ADDRESS, ACCESS_MODE) VALUES (#CUID#, #LABEL_CN#, #CITY#, #ADDRESS#, '2')
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_COMMUNITY T WHERE T.LABEL_CN = #LABEL_CN# AND ACCESS_MODE=2
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM BUSINESS_COMMUNITY WHERE 1=1
AND CUID = #CUID#
AND 1=2
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BUSINESS_COMMUNITY SET LABEL_CN =#LABEL_CN#, CITY = #CITY#, ADDRESS = #ADDRESS#, BUILDINGS_NUM = #BUILDINGS_NUM#, UNITS_NUM = #UNITS_NUM#, HOUSEHOLDS_NUM = #HOUSEHOLDS_NUM#, MAINTAIN_PERSON = #MAINTAIN_PERSON#, MAINTAIN_DEPT = #MAINTAIN_DEPT#, WARNING_VALUE = #WARNING_VALUE#, CONTACT_NUMBER = #CONTACT_NUMBER#, CONSTRUCT_DEPT = #CONSTRUCT_DEPT#, IS_PRIORITY = #IS_PRIORITY#, IS_LIGHT_CHANGED = #IS_LIGHT_CHANGED#, IS_OVERLAPP = #IS_OVERLAPP#, BUILD_TYPE = #BUILD_TYPE#, EAST_LONGITUDE = #EAST_LONGITUDE#, EAST_LATITUDE = #EAST_LATITUDE#, WEST_LONGITUDE = #WEST_LONGITUDE#, WEST_LATITUDE = #WEST_LATITUDE#, SOUTH_LONGITUDE = #SOUTH_LONGITUDE#, SOUTH_LATITUDE = #SOUTH_LATITUDE#, NORTH_LONGITUDE = #NORTH_LONGITUDE#, NORTH_LATITUDE =#NORTH_LATITUDE# WHERE CUID = #CUID# AND ACCESS_MODE=2
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESS_COMMUNITY (LABEL_CN , CITY , ADDRESS , BUILDINGS_NUM , UNITS_NUM , HOUSEHOLDS_NUM , MAINTAIN_PERSON , MAINTAIN_DEPT , WARNING_VALUE , CONTACT_NUMBER , CONSTRUCT_DEPT , IS_PRIORITY , IS_LIGHT_CHANGED, IS_OVERLAPP , BUILD_TYPE, ACCESS_MODE, EAST_LONGITUDE, EAST_LATITUDE, WEST_LONGITUDE, WEST_LATITUDE, SOUTH_LONGITUDE, SOUTH_LATITUDE, NORTH_LONGITUDE, NORTH_LATITUDE, CUID ) VALUES (#LABEL_CN#, #CITY#, #ADDRESS#, #BUILDINGS_NUM#, #UNITS_NUM#, #HOUSEHOLDS_NUM#, #MAINTAIN_PERSON#, #MAINTAIN_DEPT#, #WARNING_VALUE#, #CONTACT_NUMBER#, #CONSTRUCT_DEPT#, #IS_PRIORITY#, #IS_LIGHT_CHANGED#, #IS_OVERLAPP#, #BUILD_TYPE#, '2', #EAST_LONGITUDE#, #EAST_LATITUDE#, #WEST_LONGITUDE#, #WEST_LATITUDE#, #SOUTH_LONGITUDE#, #SOUTH_LATITUDE#, #NORTH_LONGITUDE#, #NORTH_LATIT#, #CUID# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT LABEL_CN,(SELECT LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT D WHERE D.CUID = BC.CITY ) AS CITY, ADDRESS, BUILDINGS_NUM, UNITS_NUM, HOUSEHOLDS_NUM, MAINTAIN_PERSON, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM T_ROFH_MAINTAIN_DEPT MD WHERE MD.CUID = BC.MAINTAIN_DEPT) AS MAINTAIN_DEPT, WARNING_VALUE, CONTACT_NUMBER, (SELECT LABEL_CN FROM T_ROFH_MAINTAIN_DEPT MD WHERE MD.CUID = BC.CONSTRUCT_DEPT) CONSTRUCT_DEPT,CONSTRUCT_DEPT AS CONSTRUCT_DEPT_CUID, decode(IS_PRIORITY,'1','是','2','否') AS IS_PRIORITY, decode(IS_LIGHT_CHANGED,'1','是','2','否') AS IS_LIGHT_CHANGED, decode(IS_OVERLAPP,'1','是','2','否') AS IS_OVERLAPP,BUILD_TYPE, CUID FROM BUSINESS_COMMUNITY BC WHERE CUID=#cuid#

SELECT LABEL_CN, CITY, ADDRESS, BUILDINGS_NUM, UNITS_NUM, HOUSEHOLDS_NUM, MAINTAIN_PERSON, MAINTAIN_DEPT, WARNING_VALUE, CONTACT_NUMBER, CONSTRUCT_DEPT, IS_PRIORITY, IS_LIGHT_CHANGED, IS_OVERLAPP, BUILD_TYPE,CUID, EAST_LONGITUDE, EAST_LATITUDE, WEST_LONGITUDE, WEST_LATITUDE, SOUTH_LONGITUDE, SOUTH_LATITUDE, NORTH_LONGITUDE, NORTH_LATITUDE
FROM BUSINESS_COMMUNITY BC WHERE CUID=#cuid#

SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN , CITY , ADDRESS , BUILDINGS_NUM , UNITS_NUM , HOUSEHOLDS_NUM , MAINTAIN_PERSON , MAINTAIN_DEPT , WARNING_VALUE , CONTACT_NUMBER , CONSTRUCT_DEPT , IS_PRIORITY , IS_LIGHT_CHANGED , IS_OVERLAPP , BUILD_TYPE, EAST_LONGITUDE, EAST_LATITUDE, WEST_LONGITUDE, WEST_LATITUDE, SOUTH_LONGITUDE, SOUTH_LATITUDE, NORTH_LONGITUDE, NORTH_LATITUDE FROM BUSINESS_COMMUNITY WHERE LABEL_CN=#LABEL_CN# AND CITY =#CITY# AND ACCESS_MODE=2
SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN FROM DISTRICT WHERE LABEL_CN=#labelCn#
SELECT CUID,LABEL_CN FROM T_ROFH_MAINTAIN_DEPT MD WHERE LABEL_CN=#labelCn#
SELECT CUID, LABEL_CN FROM (SELECT '1' AS CUID, '是' AS LABEL_CN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS CUID, '否' AS LABEL_CN FROM DUAL) WHERE LABEL_CN =#labelCn#
